testing.andrei.httpServer

Class TestServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • testing.andrei.httpServer.NanoHTTPD
      • testing.andrei.httpServer.TestServer

  • public class TestServer
extends NanoHTTPD
    Provides access to the agent system by means of HTTP calls. Uses a simple HTTP server (based on NanoHTTPD).

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class testing.andrei.httpServer.NanoHTTPD

        Builds (and, not complying to the Unit specification, also starts) the web server.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • doexit

        public void doexit()
        Closes the web server and the window. There will be no more answer to requests on the specified port.

        method - "GET", "POST" etc.
